about_the_game:
Paradox! is a fast-paced, single-screen puzzle platformer that requires planning, logic thinking, and quick reflexes. Step into the shoes of an eccentric (but not too bright) scientist who accidentally strands himself in the past after damaging his time machine. Your mission? Team up with your younger self to return to the present!

Play Every Level Twice!

In the first phase, you play as the sprightly young professor. Your task is to collect all the scattered time crystals while dodging deadly lasers, navigating vanishing platforms, and racing against a ticking clock that threatens to erase you from existence. Strangely, it seems someone is helping you by manipulating the environment...



The second phase reveals the twist - you play now the older, wiser (but creakier) version of yourself! Your job is to manipulate the environment, ensuring your younger self's success in a paradoxical partnership. You must guide your past self to collect all the time crystals and escape each level before time runs out.



Be wary: danger lurks around every corner! If you slip up and the professors touch each other, then you'll be erased from existence! Thankfully, you have a tricked-out cane stick and sick rollers to gain an edge against the relentless march of time.

Still not sure?

Here's what else Paradox! has in store:

•⁠ BRAIN-TEASING LEVELS packed with obstacles that will test your wits and reflexes!



•⁠ ⁠BONUS CHALLENGES and UNLOCKABLES for dedicated time traveler!



•⁠ COLOSSAL BOSSES itching to wipe you from the timeline!

Ready to Bend Time?

Add Paradox! to your WISHLIST now to stay updated on this time-bending adventure!

JOIN OUR DISCORD!


About the Game



Paradox! is a fast-paced, single-screen puzzle platformer that requires planning, logic thinking, and quick reflexes. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple M1 o Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Paradox!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Paradox! is a fast-paced, single-screen puzzle platformer that requires planning, logic thinking, and quick reflexes. Play as an eccentric, but not-too-bright scientist who is stuck in the past after clumsily breaking his time machine. Collaborate with your younger self to return to present.
